resources.string:
Some general infos.



This screen was added mostly to showcase the usage of tabs.
yBDDTests was developed by Intesys for UI-testing\nits projects.
Is it a yes or a no?
In android a Stepper component doesn\'t exist.\nIt would be possible to implement a custom one but it wouldn\'t add useful information for tests
In material the only pickers are DatePickers and TimePickers.\nThese are non material pickers that might be used.

The cat photo used in this app is from: https://unsplash.com/it/foto/gatto-in-bianco-e-nero-sdraiato-su-una-sedia-di-bambu-marrone-allinterno-della-stanza-gKXKBY-C-Dk?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash) in the images section is from [Manja Vitolic](https://unsplash.com/it/@madhatterzone?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash by Manja Vitolic

The dog photo used in this app is from: https://unsplash.com/it/foto/labrador-retriever-cioccolato-adulto-v3-zcCWMjgM?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash by James Barker
